#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int arr[10]={0,1,6,1,6,5,6,1,6,1};
char n[4];
while(1)
{
scanf("%s",&n);
if(n[0]=='#')
break;
else
{
int num=atoi(n);
int sum=4,m;
if(num==1)
cout<<"1"<<endl;
else if(num==2)
cout<<"5"<<endl;
else if(num==3)
cout<<"4"<<endl;
else
{
while(num>=4)
{
m=num%10;
sum+=arr[m];
num--;
}
cout<<sum%10<<endl;
}
}
}
}
